raw_answer:
The document states on page 3: "Patients carrying the p.D620N mutation did not have any other variants in all exons of VPS35."

Patient CII-3 is listed in Table 1 (page 3) as having the VPS35 p.D620N mutation with a genotype of A/G.

Since patients with the p.D620N mutation did not have any other variants in VPS35, there is no information about a "second" or "third" mutation in the VPS35 gene for patient CII-3. The study screened for 7 variants (page 2, "Genetic Analysis"), but only p.D620N was detected in any patient (Abstract: "None of the other reported variants of VPS35 were detected."; Page 3: "The remaining variants analyzed in this study were not identified in any patients.").

Therefore, information about a "third mutation" for patient CII-3 is not found in the document.

Information not found
question: Regarding patient 'CII-3' from family 'Family C': What is the genotype of the third mutation?
context:
